mod-enabled.label: Enabled
mod-enabled.tooltip: Toggle mod functionality, disable if there's an issue. Default: true
default-colors.label: Use Dye Colors
default-colors.tooltip: Toggle using dye colors of fish if no overrides are supplied. Default: true
single-overrides.label: Disable Individual Overrides
single-overrides.tooltip: Primarily for compatibility with mods that change fish pond colors. Set to true to disable individual fish overrides. Default: false
required-population.label: Required Population
required-population.tooltip: Number of fish required for context color changes only. Default: 2
debugging.label: Debugging
debugging.tooltip: Toggle showing more console debug info. Default: false
prismatic-speed.label: Prismatic Speed
prismatic-speed.tooltip: Speed multiplier for how far prismatic ponds shift between colors. Smaller numbers means a more subtle color shift. Default: 0.3
